item.title: 三星 Galaxy S25 Edge 展示超薄手机的极限
item.description:
评论：这款手机是今年即将推出的几款超薄设备之一，为了追求轻巧的设计，它在电池续航时间方面有所欠缺。【原文：

Review: The handset, one of several slim devices coming this year, skimps on battery life for the sake of a light design.

】

item.title: KKR 认为救援计划上升空间有限，退出泰晤士河投标
item.description: KKR & Co.撤回了对泰晤士水务公司 40 亿英镑（约合 54 亿美元）的投资竞标，因为这家美国基础设施巨头意识到这笔交易几乎没有上升空间。【原文：KKR & Co. withdrew its bid to invest £4 billion ($5.4 billion) in Thames Water when the US infrastructure giant realized there was little upside to a deal, according to people familiar with the deliberations.】

item.title: CBO 预计特朗普关税将使预算缺口减少 2.8 万亿美元
item.description: 据无党派的国会预算办公室称，唐纳德-特朗普总统5月中旬生效的关税政策将有助于美国财政赤字减少约2.8万亿美元。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff policies in effect as of mid-May would help to shrink US fiscal deficits by an estimated $2.8 trillion, according to the nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office.】

item.title: 摩根大通计划为客户提供针对加密货币 ETF 的融资服务
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）计划让交易和财富管理客户使用一些与加密货币相关的资产作为贷款抵押品，这是美国最大的银行进军唐纳德-特朗普总统承诺支持的行业的重要一步。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. plans to let trading and wealth-management clients use some cryptocurrency-linked assets as collateral for loans, a major step by the biggest US bank to make inroads into an industry President Donald Trump has pledged to support.】

item.title: 加拿大银行保持稳定后，海湾街预计未来将减息
item.description: 分析人士认为，加拿大央行决定将政策利率维持在 2.75% 的水平，这表明加拿大央行在等待更多数据的同时，更关注核心通胀而非疲软的经济增长。【原文：The Bank of Canada’s decision to hold its policy interest rate at 2.75% shows that it’s more focused on core inflation than weak economic growth as it waits to get more data, according to analysts.】

item.title: 野火促使赫德贝公司和阿拉莫斯黄金公司撤离加拿大矿山
item.description: 加拿大野火肆虐，在资源丰富的西部省份，热浪和狂风将火苗推向各处，一些采矿作业被迫撤离。【原文：Raging Canadian wildfires have forced evacuations from several mining operations as heat and wind push flames across the resource-rich western provinces.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯希望 "欧佩克+"更大幅度地加息
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯希望欧佩克+在未来几个月继续加速增加石油供应，因为它更重视夺回失去的市场份额。【原文：Saudi Arabia wants OPEC+ to continue with accelerated oil supply hikes in the coming months as it puts greater importance on regaining lost market share, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 微软 LinkedIn 负责人在人工智能大调整中掌管办公集团
item.description: 微软公司的 LinkedIn 首席执行官正在负责组建电子邮件和生产力应用程序的团队，这次重组整合了该公司更多的工作场所软件，因为该公司正努力加快人工智能工具的部署。【原文：The chief of Microsoft Corp.’s LinkedIn is taking charge of the teams that build email and productivity apps, in a reorganization that consolidates more of the company’s workplace software as it seeks to speed up deployment of artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: Pornhub 暂停在法国的网站以抗议年龄验证法
item.description: Pornhub、Youporn 和 RedTube 的母公司在法国禁止访问其成人内容，以抗议该国新的年龄验证要求。【原文：The parent company of Pornhub, Youporn and RedTube blocked access to its adult content in France to protest new age verification requirements in the country.】

item.title: 凯雷的 Wise 表示，免于关税的美国公司应加快发展步伐
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc. Steve Wise）认为，没有直接受到美国关税影响的公司应该利用这段时间，在其他公司撤退时采取更积极的行动。【原文：Companies without direct exposure to US tariffs should use this time to be more aggressive as others retreat, according to Carlyle Group Inc.’s Steve Wise.】

item.title: 据说 Circle IPO 的定价可能会高于市场范围
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Circle Internet Group Inc.【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc.’s initial public offering is likely to price above the marketed range, after fielding orders for more than 25 times the number of shares available in the upsized deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特 IPO 在红利逆转后吸引 320 亿美元订单
item.description: 总部位于沙特阿拉伯的专业医疗公司（Specialized Medical Co.【原文：Saudi Arabia-based Specialized Medical Co. attracted about 121 billion riyals ($32 billion) in orders for its initial public offering, following a reset of its institutional order book after the company clawed back recently paid dividends.】

item.title: 据说梅菲尔正在酝酿收购房产分类网站 AtHome
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在收到潜在投资者的兴趣后，Mayfair Equity Partners 正在考虑对总部位于卢森堡的房产分类网站 atHome Group 的收购方案。【原文：Mayfair Equity Partners is considering options for Luxembourg-based property classified site atHome Group after receiving interest from potential investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧佩克+增产更多桶石油，沙特阿拉伯下调亚洲油价
item.description: 在欧佩克+继续第三个月超额增产后，沙特阿美公司下调了面向亚洲买家的主要石油等级的价格。【原文：Saudi Aramco cut the price of its main oil grade to buyers in Asia after OPEC+ continued with its outsized output increases for a third month.】

item.title: 纽约联储研究报告称，关税后企业迅速提价
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行对全区企业进行的一项最新调查显示，企业为应对关税迅速提高了价格，但裁员幅度不大。【原文：Businesses have hiked prices quickly in response to tariffs, though only modestly cut headcount, according to a new study by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York that surveyed companies across the district.】

item.title: 摩洛哥推出游戏中心，吸引开发者，促进产业发展
item.description: 摩洛哥希望从利润丰厚的全球博彩市场中分得一杯羹，首先是开设一个大型工业园区，这是经济多元化和增加出口收入计划的一部分。【原文：Morocco is looking to secure a slice of the lucrative global gaming market, starting with the opening of a major industrial park, part of a plan to diversify the economy and boost export revenues.】

item.title: 南非 10 年期债券收益率降至 2022 年以来最低点
item.description: 南非 10 年期国债收益率三年多来首次跌破 10%，因为投资者押注该国将在第三次争取预算支持的努力中取得成功。【原文：South Africa’s 10-year government bond yield dropped below 10% for the first time in more than three years as investors bet the nation will be successful in its third attempt at corralling support for its budget.】

item.title: 谷歌警告黑客窃取公司 Salesforce 数据
item.description: 据谷歌威胁情报小组的一份新报告称，一个黑客组织一直在冒充 IT 人员入侵公司的 Salesforce 工具，利用访问权限进行数据盗窃和勒索。【原文：A hacking group has been impersonating IT personnel to break into companies’ Salesforce tools, using the access for data theft and extortion, according to a new report from Google’s threat intelligence group.】

item.title: CBO称共和党税收法案将使美国赤字增加2.4万亿美元
item.description: 据无党派的国会预算办公室最新估计，唐纳德-特朗普总统的税收和支出法案的众议院通过版本将使美国未来十年的预算赤字增加 2.42 万亿美元。【原文：The House-passed version of President Donald Trump’s tax and spending bill would add $2.42 trillion to US budget deficits over the next decade, according to a new estimate from the nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office.】

item.title: 美国服务业活动近一年来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 由于需求突然下降，美国服务提供商的活动在上个月滑入萎缩区间，这是近一年以来的首次。【原文：Activity at US service providers slipped into contraction territory last month for the first time in nearly a year on an abrupt pullback in demand, while prices accelerated as higher tariffs reverberated across the economy.】

item.title: 招聘疲软，大型科技公司引领 S&P 500 指数走高
item.description: 美国股市周三高开，科技股的涨势抵消了上月招聘降温的报告。【原文：US stocks opened higher on Wednesday as gains in tech shares offset a report showing hiring cooled last month.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率维持在 2.75%，"可能需要 "降息
item.description: 加拿大央行在连续第二次会议上保持利率稳定，但官员们表示，如果经济疲软，通胀仍然受控，美国关税产生影响，可能需要削减借贷成本。【原文：The Bank of Canada held interest rates steady for a second consecutive meeting, but officials said there may be a need to cut borrowing costs if the economy weakens and inflation remains contained as US tariffs make an impact.】

item.title: 波兰在关键投票后的首次会议上保持利率稳定
item.description: 波兰国家银行一如预期维持利率不变，投资者重点关注行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）在关键的总统大选后即将发表的言论基调。【原文：The National Bank of Poland kept interest rates on hold, as expected, with investors focusing on the tone of Governor Adam Glapinski’s upcoming comments in the wake of a pivotal presidential election.】

item.title: 印度将从 2027 年 3 月起进行人口普查
item.description: 印度周三表示，它将从 2027 年 3 月开始为新的人口普查收集数据，从而平息了这个南亚国家在推迟四年后何时更新人口信息的不确定性。【原文：India said Wednesday that it will begin gathering data for a new census from March 2027, putting to rest uncertainty about when the South Asian nation will update its demographics information after a delay of four years.】

item.title: 巴西今年第二次利用国际债务市场
item.description: 巴西在不到六个月的时间里第二次发售债券，因为投资者希望从美国市场分散投资，这推动了新兴市场资产的反弹。【原文：Brazil is offering debt for the second time in less than six months as investors seeking to diversify away from the US fuel a rally in emerging-market assets.】

item.title: 华尔街对宽松资本规则的梦想如何渐行渐近
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在第二个任期伊始就承诺要削减监管。越来越多的迹象表明，这一精简联邦法规的举措可能会实现华尔街的一个长期愿望：放宽对银行的资本要求，特别是补充杠杆率。【原文：US President Donald Trump kicked off his second term promising to slash regulation. There are growing signs that this push to streamline the federal rulebook could fulfill one of Wall Street’s longstanding wishes: an easing of capital requirements for banks, specifically the supplementary leverage ratio.】

item.title: 图斯克盟友选举失利，波兰财政困境成焦点
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）的候选人在周日的总统大选中落败，这让投资者把注意力转移到了这个新兴市场令人担忧的公共财政问题上。【原文：The defeat of Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk’s candidate in Sunday’s presidential election is shifting investor focus toward the emerging-market’s troubling public finances.】

item.title: 检察官指控俄罗斯是针对英国境内乌克兰公司纵火袭击的幕后黑手
item.description: 在对被控在本土推动俄罗斯议程的六名男子的审判开始时，检察官称，俄罗斯情报部门是伦敦一家仓库纵火案的幕后黑手，该仓库向乌克兰供应货物，包括太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）旗下的星链（StarLink）卫星设备。【原文：Russian intelligence services were behind an arson attack at a London warehouse that supplied goods to Ukraine, including SpaceX-owned StarLink satellite equipment, prosecutors alleged at the start of a trial against six men accused of pushing Russia’s agenda on home soil.】

item.title: 调查显示：银行将 2025 年油价预测降至 60 美元以下
item.description: 据海恩斯博恩律师事务所（Haynes Boone LLP）的一项调查显示，在欧佩克+增产和原油需求增长持平的情况下，银行将今年的平均油价预期下调至每桶60美元以下。【原文：Banks are cutting estimates for the average oil price this year to below $60 a barrel amid production hikes from OPEC+ and flat crude demand growth, according to a survey from the law firm Haynes Boone LLP.】

item.title: Lucid 签订美国石墨协议，争夺国内电池材料市场
item.description: 汽车制造商 Lucid Group Inc. 签订了第三份美国加工石墨协议，扩大了其电动汽车电池重要组件的国内供应。【原文：Automaker Lucid Group Inc. signed a third agreement for US-processed graphite, extending its bid for domestic supplies of an essential component in its electric vehicle batteries.】
